    • askInteger

      public int askInteger(String inputOption)
      This method request information from the user and return the correct input value (integer data type). showError(String).
      Parameters:
      inputOption - It is a String variable that we use to ask a user for information.
      Returns:
      A value of primitive type integer entered by the user.

    • askString

      public String askString(String inputOption)
      This method request information from the user and return the correct input value (String data type). showError(String).
      Parameters:
      inputOption - It is a String variable that we use to ask a user for information.
      Returns:
      A value of non primitive type String entered by the user.
